title: HR & Recruitment Specialist
job_overview:
Hello ladies! We're Hiring: HR & Recruitment Specialist

About the Role:

We’re looking for an experienced, reliable, and people-focused HR & Recruitment Specialist to join our team! You’ll be in charge of managing hiring, onboarding, and supporting a smooth and professional employee experience.

Key Responsibilities:

Write and post job ads on hiring platforms
Screen resumes and coordinate interviews
Assist in hiring decisions and onboarding new teaUpgrade to see actual infombers
Maintain accurate HR records and files
Track attendance, assist with payroll, and support compliance
Facilitate team communications and employee feedback
Coordinate performance reviews, training, and HR documentation
Draft offer letters, contracts, and other HR materials

What We’re Looking For:

1–3+ years of HR or recruitment experience required
Strong communication and organizational skills
Ability to handle sensitive information with discretion
Tech-savvy with HR tools, Google Workspace, or MS Office
A proactive, solution-oriented mindset
Friendly, fair, and people-first personality

We want to know you more:

Send your resume and a short cover letter to [Your Email Address]
Subject line: “HR Specialist Application – [Your Name]”
And don’t forget to include your birth order (eldest, middle, or youngest)!
